transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Scheme of Assistance for the Prevention of Alcoholism & Substance (Drugs) Abuse and for Social Defence Services: General Grant-in-Aid Programme for Financial Assistance in the Field of Social Defence
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
objectives: Support innovative/pilot initiatives for welfare and empowerment
Address needs not covered under regular schemes
eligibility_criteria: Organizations or initiatives aligned with Ministry’s target groups
Innovative or pilot projects in social defence

steps: Apply through Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
Submit project proposal and required documents

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Asangathit Karmakar Samachar-Patr Hawker Cycle Sahayata Yojana
objectives: Provide free cycles to unorganized workers (newspaper hawkers)
Empower unorganized workers through mobility support
documents_required: Proof of occupation as newspaper hawker

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Financial Assistance To Institutions/Societies Belonging To Scheduled Castes/Backward Classes
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Department of Welfare of Scheduled Castes & Backward Classes
objectives: Provide financial assistance for infrastructure development
Support institutions/societies of Scheduled Castes/Backward Classes

steps: Apply through Department of Welfare of SC & BC

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: HRIDAY: Heritage City Development & Augmentation Yojana
objectives: Promote urban planning and economic growth through heritage conservation
Develop infrastructure in heritage cities
eligibility_criteria: Designated heritage cities under the scheme
Projects aligned with urban planning and heritage conservation

steps: Submit project proposal to Ministry of Tourism

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha Evam Utthan Mahabhiyan Scheme For Farmers
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Department of New and Renewable Energy
objectives: Subsidize farmers for installing solar irrigation pumps
Enhance agricultural productivity through renewable energy
eligibility_criteria: Require solar irrigation pumps for cultivation

steps: Apply through PM-KUSUM portal or state nodal agencies

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Agricultural Marketing Infrastructure
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Cooperation and Farmers Welfare
objectives: Develop agricultural value chain infrastructure
Enhance farmers’ income through storage and marketing facilities

benefits.infrastructure_support: Funding for storage and marketing infrastructure

eligibility_criteria: Farmers, promoters, or organizations involved in agricultural marketing
Projects focused on post-harvest value chain

steps: Apply through ISAM portal or state agriculture department

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Infrastructure Subsidy under Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries
objectives: Encourage industrial units through infrastructure subsidies
Support building investments for industrial growth

steps: Apply through Industries and Commerce Department

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Shravan Kumar Shramik Parivar Tirth Yatra Yojana
objectives: Provide financial assistance for pilgrimage travel
Support families of construction workers

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Scheme for Grant of Financial Assistance for Administering Road Safety Advocacy and Awards for the Outstanding Work Done in the Field of Road Safety
objectives: Promote road safety awareness
Reward agencies for outstanding road safety work
eligibility_criteria: NGOs, cooperative societies, or trusts involved in road safety

steps: Apply through Ministry of Road Transport & Highways

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan
objectives: Strengthen Panchayati Raj System in rural areas
Develop infrastructure and governance capacity
eligibility_criteria: Panchayati Raj institutions in rural India
Projects for governance and infrastructure development

steps: Apply through Ministry of Panchayati Raj

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Pilgrimage Rejuvenation and Spiritual Augmentation Drive (PRASHAD)
objectives: Develop infrastructure at pilgrimage sites
Enhance religious tourism experience
eligibility_criteria: Projects for infrastructure and tourism enhancement

steps: Submit project proposal to Ministry of Tourism

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Mukhyamantri Prakhand Parivahan Yojana
objectives: Provide transportation facilities connecting blocks and remote Panchayats
Encourage entrepreneurship among SC/ST/Backward Classes through bus purchase subsidies
eligibility_criteria: Entrepreneur intending to operate bus services

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: District Central Cooperative Banks and through its Branches: Small Road Transport Operators Loan (SRTO Loan)
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Co-operation, Food and Consumer Protection Department
objectives: Provide financial support to small-scale road transport operators
Enhance transport infrastructure through loans

steps: Apply through District Central Cooperative Banks

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Fair Recreational Activity and Non-Competitive Involvement in Sports Urban Connect Scheme (F.R.A.N.C.I.S Urban Connect Scheme)
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Department of Sports and Youth Affairs
objectives: Develop safe play areas in urban communities
Promote healthy recreation and sports

benefits.infrastructure_support: Funding for developing urban play areas

eligibility_criteria: Urban communities or local bodies in Goa
Projects for safe play area development

steps: Apply through Department of Sports and Youth Affairs

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Travel Concession To The Differently Abled Persons In State Owned Transport Corporation Buses
objectives: Provide travel concessions for differently abled persons
Enhance accessibility in state-owned buses

benefits.concession: Discounted or free travel in state transport buses

eligibility_criteria: Person with disability certified by medical authority

steps: Apply through Transport Department or state bus corporations

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Jharkhand Petrol Subsidy Scheme
transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.department: Food, Public Distribution & Consumer Affairs Department
objectives: Provide petrol subsidy for two-wheelers
Support NFSA/Jharkhand State Food Security Scheme beneficiaries
eligibility_criteria: Beneficiary of NFSA or Jharkhand State Food Security Scheme

steps: Apply through Food, Public Distribution & Consumer Affairs Department

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Subsidy to Purchase E-Bike for Journalists
objectives: Provide financial assistance for e-bike purchase
Support journalists’ mobility and reduce pollution

steps: Apply through Department of Information and Publicity

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Grant of Fuel Subsidy to Differently Abled Persons Who Are Owning Motorised Vehicles
objectives: Provide fuel subsidy for differently abled persons
Support mobility for motorized vehicle owners
eligibility_criteria: Person with disability owning a motorized vehicle

steps: Apply through Department of Social Welfare
Submit disability certificate and vehicle details

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Infrastructure Development Subsidy (For IT/ITES) under Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Capital Intensive Industries
objectives: Support infrastructure for IT/ITES industries
Provide subsidies for building investments

benefits.subsidy: 30% subsidy on building investment, up to ₹1,00,00,000 for 50,000 sq.ft.

eligibility_criteria: Infrastructure developers or IT/ITES industries in Puducherry

steps: Apply through Industries and Commerce Department

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: Grant-in-aid Scheme to Village Education Committees/Urban Education Committees for minor repairs of Government School buildings
objectives: Provide grants for minor repairs of government school buildings
Support Village/Urban Education Committees

benefits.grant: Financial assistance for minor school building repairs

transport_and_infrastructure_schemes.scheme_name: E-Rickshaw Kalyan Yojana
objectives: Promote cleaner transportation through e-rickshaws
Generate employment opportunities for entrepreneurs

benefits.financial_assistance: Subsidies and incentives for e-rickshaw purchase

eligibility_criteria: Individuals/entrepreneurs operating e-rickshaws in urban/semi-urban areas
